title: Pie dish

properties.name: description
properties.value: A pie dish is used in Cooking to bake pies. Players must add a pastry dough (a pot of flour and a jug of water combined) to the pie dish to form a pie shell. It then can be filled by the filling of choice. Afterwards, the pie can then be baked in an oven. Players can create this in a pottery oven.

Item ID2313

A pie dish is used in Cooking to bake pies. Players must add a pastry dough (a pot of flour and a jug of water combined) to the pie dish to form a pie shell. It then can be filled by the filling of choice. Afterwards, the pie can then be baked in an oven. Players can create this in a pottery oven.
